com.google.gwt.widgetideas.table.client
Interface HasSortableColumns

All Superinterfaces:
HasColumns, HasFixedColumnWidth
All Known Implementing Classes:
BulkEditablePagingGrid, EditableGridView, GridView, SortableFixedWidthGrid
public interface HasSortableColumns
extends HasFixedColumnWidth

An interface for tables that support column sorting.
